sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import { MagnifyingGlassIcon, FunnelIcon, StarIcon, ClockIcon, UserGroupIcon, HeartIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import { HeartIcon as HeartIconSolid } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid' import { useLanguage } from '../components/LanguageProvider' const RecipeListPage = () => { const { t, language } = useLanguage() const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('') const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all') const [selectedDifficulty, setSelectedDifficulty] = useState('all') const [favorites, setFavorites] = useState([1, 3]) // Mock favorites const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Categories', nameHi: 'सभी श्रेणियां' }, { id: 'breakfast', name: 'Breakfast', nameHi: 'नाश्ता' }, { id: 'lunch', name: 'Lunch', nameHi: 'दोपहर का भोजन' }, { id: 'dinner', name: 'Dinner', nameHi: 'रात का भोजन' }, { id: 'snacks', name: 'Snacks', nameHi: 'नाश्ता' }, { id: 'desserts', name: 'Desserts', nameHi: 'मिठाई' }, { id: 'beverages', name: 'Beverages', nameHi: 'पेय' } ] const difficulties = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Levels', nameHi: 'सभी स्तर' }, { id: 'easy', name: 'Easy', nameHi: 'आसान' }, { id: 'medium', name: 'Medium', nameHi: 'मध्यम' }, { id: 'hard', name: 'Hard', nameHi: 'कठिन' } ] const recipes = [ { id: 1, title: 'Butter Chicken', titleHi: 'बटर चिकन', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565557623262-b51c2513a641?w=400&h=300&fit=crop', time: '45 min', difficulty: 'medium', rating: 4.8, category: 'dinner', description: 'Creamy and flavorful Indian curry', descriptionHi: 'क्रीमी और स्वादिष्ट भारतीय करी' }, { id: 2, title: 'Biryani', titleHi: 'बिरयानी', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1563379091339-03246963d8a9?w=400&h=300&fit=crop', time: '60 min', difficulty: 'hard', rating: 4.9, category: 'dinner', description: 'Aromatic rice dish with tender meat', descriptionHi: 'नरम मांस के साथ सुगंधित चावल का व्यंजन' }, { id: 3, title: 'Masala Dosa', titleHi: 'मसाला दोसा', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1589302168068-964664d93dc0?w=400&h=300&fit=crop', time: '30 min', difficulty: 'easy', rating: 4.6, category: 'breakfast', description: 'Crispy rice crepe with spiced potato filling', descriptionHi: 'मसालेदार आलू भरने के साथ कुरकुरा चावल का क्रेप' }, { id: 4, title: 'Paneer Tikka', titleHi: 'पनीर टिक्का', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1601050690597-df0568f70950?w=400&h=300&fit=crop', time: '25 min', difficulty: 'easy', rating: 4.7, category: 'snacks', description: 'Grilled cottage cheese with aromatic spices', descriptionHi: 'सुगंधित मसालों के साथ ग्रिल्ड कॉटेज चीज़' }, { id: 5, title: 'Gulab Jamun', titleHi: 'गुलाब जामुन', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586444248902-2f64eddc13df?w=400&h=300&fit=crop', time: '40 min', difficulty: 'medium', rating: 4.5, category: 'desserts', description: 'Sweet milk solids in sugar syrup', descriptionHi: 'चीनी सिरप में मीठे दूध के ठोस' }, { id: 6, title: 'Masala Chai', titleHi: 'मसाला चाय', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544787219-7f47ccb76574?w=400&h=300&fit=crop', time: '15 min', difficulty: 'easy', rating: 4.4, category: 'beverages', description: 'Spiced Indian tea with milk', descriptionHi: 'दूध के साथ मसालेदार भारतीय चाय' } ] const toggleFavorite = (recipeId) => { setFavorites(prev => prev.includes(recipeId) ? prev.filter(id => id !== recipeId) : [...prev, recipeId] ) } const filteredRecipes = recipes.filter(recipe => { const matchesSearch = recipe.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || recipe.titleHi.includes(searchQuery) const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'all' || recipe.category === selectedCategory const matchesDifficulty = selectedDifficulty === 'all' || recipe.difficulty === selectedDifficulty return matchesSearch && matchesCategory && matchesDifficulty }) return (
{/* Header */}

{t('recipes')}

Discover delicious recipes from around the world, carefully curated for your culinary journey.

{/* Search and Filters */}
{/* Search */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} placeholder={t('search')} className="input-field pl-10" />
{/* Category Filter */}
{/* Difficulty Filter */}
{/* Results Count */}

Showing {filteredRecipes.length} recipe{filteredRecipes.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''}

{/* Recipe Grid */} {filteredRecipes.length > 0 ? (
{filteredRecipes.map((recipe, index) => (
{language === 'en' ? categories.find(c => c.id === recipe.category)?.name : categories.find(c => c.id === recipe.category)?.nameHi }
{ e.preventDefault() toggleFavorite(recipe.id) }} className="absolute top-3 left-3 p-2 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-full hover:bg-white transition-colors" > {favorites.includes(recipe.id) ? ( ) : ( )}

{language === 'en' ? recipe.title : recipe.titleHi}

{language === 'en' ? recipe.description : recipe.descriptionHi}

{recipe.time}
{recipe.difficulty}
{recipe.rating}
))}
) : (

No recipes found

Try adjusting your search or filters

 )}
) } export default RecipeListPage
